faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

label.en: 24/25 S block mode part 2 3 CP HV

description.en: Observing, planning and teaching group and individual music lessons for different age groups.
description.et: Erinevates vanuseastmetes muusika grupi- ja individuaaltundide vaatlemine, planeerimine ning läbiviimine.

objectives.en: The aim of speciality practice II is to integrate the educational and pedagogic knowledge of students in the reality; applied form of acquiring music teaching skills the main tasks of which are to * integrate theoretical knowledge and pedagogical skills of music teaching; * acknowledge the role(s) of a teacher in a real school in its social and cultural context today; * develop self-consciousness of the student and motivate theoretical studies; * develop the perception of differences due to individuality of students in instructing their creative work, the skills to choose personal sub methodology. Observation practice at a kindergarden,  music school and elementary school: getting an overview of the work of an music teacher and of the organization of school life.

audience.et: Muusika õppekava koolimuusika suuna SÕ üliõpilased
